login.title: system login
login.thirdpartyTips: 本地不能模拟，请结合自己业务进行模拟！！！
login.setPasswordOk: Successful setup, please log in with your account password
login.setPassword: Log in for the first time, please set a password
login.chooseCompany: I have detected that you are currently working in multiple companies, please select the company you want to enter.
login.title3: 检测到您未在任何公司/组织任职，或您已被所任职的公司锁定/离职/删除，无法登录。您可以选择创建新的公司/组织，或联系贵公司系统管理员
login.tip3: The verification code was sent successfully.
login.err2: Phone number format is not correct
login.err4: The entered password does not meet the rules, please re-check
login.err5: The password should be 8~20 digits, and the combination of numbers, letters and symbols
login.err6: The verification code does not match, please re-enter
login.err7: Please enter the verification code you received.
login.err10: Please fill in the company/organization name
login.err13: The password needs to contain any two of numbers, letters, symbols, and uppercase and lowercase letters.
